descriptionHtml:
Location west of riverwood (Check pictures for map) Look for the tree icon Fast travel enabled 

Recommend Class Type for mod: Class type: Archer 
****************************************************************** 
Welcome to my valenwood lodge archer mod for nexus,i have stripped this simple player 
home right back and made it a nice little free living space once again,no loading to interior 
cells just walk in and use it.This has a very nice lord of the rings/Hobbit kinda feel to it as 
you can see from the pictures,very decorative and in a good location as well.There are all 
the usual features such as bed,chest,wardobe and dressing table for your gear but also a 
full blacksmiths and cooking area is included.The chest has some nice supplies for your 
archer type char with some wall plagues for storage as well,the outside table has a strongbox 
of leveled items with a skill book.This a beautiful little mod that stands out well for your char 
with future updates planned as well adding to the area,thanks for looking. 

Update V1.2 
**************** 
Added new follower Valenwood warrior (Two handed Bezerker LVL 40) 
Added new follower Valenwood Mage (Psijiic Outcast LVL 40) 
Added Decorative Area with Shrine of Kynareth & Strongbox of arrows (Respawns) 
(Check New Pictures) 

Features 
************* 
Crafting tables (Next to Steps) 
Talos Shrine (on Table) 
LvL 30 Follower 
Elvin armor in chest FULL set 
Statue & bench Decoration 
Wall plaques 6 
Smithing area 
Cooking area 

Thanks for looking...
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
